title: Bug 120543Issue version message during loadtime weaving
description: Bug 120543Issue version message during loadtime weaving It would be very useful to know exactly which version of the weaver is being used for LTW. This message could be similar to the that issued by "ajc version".
OB: An informational message could be issued when each WeavingAdaptor instance is created (it is possible to have multiple versions of AspectJ in a system).
